summary: Brief introductions from the client, project manager, architect, developer, and QA; no agenda, decisions, or assigned tasks were recorded. Team is available to start architecture sync, code reviews, and testing when work is ready.

risks.risk: No clear agenda or assigned next steps from this meeting, risking lack of progress or misaligned priorities.
risks.mitigation: PM to circulate a clear agenda and assign concrete tasks or schedule a follow-up sync; confirm blockers and readiness for testing/PR reviews.
